text: The Skirmish at Aberdeen was a Battle that was fought between the Union army and the Confederate army in Monroe County, Arkansas, on July 9, 1862. The result of the Battle is inconclusive. ==External links== * Perseus.tufts.edu * Encyclopediaofarkansas.net Aberdeen Aberdeen Category:1862 in the American Civil War Category:1862 in Arkansas Category:July 1862 events Category:Monroe County, Arkansas
title: Skirmish at Aberdeen
